description.en: In this fun challenge you will need to do some recycling work. Put 4 cups at the 4 corners of the challenge field, they will be your trashcans. Collect 4 types of 'trash' and position them inside the center field the way you see in the picture: the ball symbolises an apple (bio-degradable), the blue CT2x2 symbolises some re-usable plastic trash and the cable stands for communal waste. Also, add a tissue or any kind of paper to the collection, too as paper waste.

In the yellow corner you have your plastic trashcan, in the blue one you have the paper trashcan, in the green corner stands your bio-degradable can and finally, the red corner has your communal waste. Your task is to sort the trash by their types and throw them into the appropriate trashcan.

Start from the start line.
Pick up one piece of trash at a time.
You have got 3 trials.

You finished within 10 minutes. = Good job! Let's try again.
You finished within 7 minutes. = Wow! Excellent job! Another try?
You finished within 4 minutes. = You are such a pro!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programming your robot?

Let's count your points.
Finished within 10 minutes. = 5 points
Finished within 7 minutes. = 10 points
Finished within 4 minutes. = 15 points
We would love to see your scores.
